entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Snow mixed with rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
